Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

Me and a few friends have been trying the demo for a couple of days, having great fun trying to make various zany and not so zany rockets. Great fun. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Finally decided to get the \'real\' version. (It\'s downloading). I\'m guessing the rest will join me in that soon enough. Anyway, it\'s genius. Lego spacecraft, but with more kablooie. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Hope you have some real fun, enjoy the game, and welcome aboard!
